alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 25 at 1:09PM MST until February 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ Sunday to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
